text: Thanks for your questions! Now I am going to share some tips from my new book Grow Your Value out today! #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @businessdiva @msnbc It is never too late to rebrand yourself. Your value is your life experience and wisdom--own it! #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @KeirSimmons Hi and THANK YOU!! Encourage them to speak up and be assertive--aggressive is NOT a bad thing! #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @stnickmedia I dont think there is a stigma--women supporting women is a good thing! #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @NishaChittal Millennials should STOP trying to befriend their bosses!!!! #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @karasstiles Millennials constantly have pos reinforcement & think things happen quickly. Take time to establish yourself & gain trust.
author: morningmika

text: @karasstiles don't expect too much too soon. (1 of 2) #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @2sunsky there is never an easy time to have kids--don't put it off trying to game this out.  (2 of 2) #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @2sunsky There is no negative impact on your ability to do your job-it makes you better.  Don't put it off. (1 or 2) #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @reed_riva Start a negotiation on the topic by saying they don't have enough women at the top and you should be one of them. And say WHY.
author: morningmika

text: @MicheleMathis Distinguish between criticism that you should not take personally and BS that you should not put up with. #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @TrettaBush There is value in being EXACTLY who you are. Every asset you have should be aligned with your message and will boost your value.
author: morningmika

text: @_Julian_NYC Grow Your Value has an incredible chapter just on Millennial because they are certainly a special group.  #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @LeighRoche8 Don't be afraid to ask for help in every facet of your life to make things work.  Do what is in front of you. #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @jtodonnell You must know your market value and be ready to communicate it effectively to your employer. #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @jtodonnell It starts with knowing your value before you can determine whether your employer truly values you. (2 of 2) #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @jtodonnell Yes, but if you say you are going to walk away you have to be ready to take that step.  (1 of 2) #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @MichaelBlaisure YOU ARE SO GREAT! Women need support systems--it is hard to do it all. Tell her to stop apologizing! #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika

text: @InnesReport There is ALWAYS room to empower other women! Learn how to communicate your value first and others will follow. #KnowYourValue
author: morningmika
